attributes.action: Abolish the Investors in People scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When schools fail Ofsted inspections, are put into special measures and poor management is cited as the main reason, how can a school still be awarded the Investors in People award in the very same week? How, when companies treat their staff so badly, threatening to take their homes away and demand they take a 24% pay cuts or face the sack, can they gain the Investors in People award? We regularly read news stories and press releases like this. It’s about time the sham called Investors in People that organisations foolishly covet so much was abolished!
